TextBlock.Text: AZOLLA: Sennetti, have you had any luck asking the Dree about how to leave the <color=purple>Deep Bramble</color>?
SENNETTI: I have asked many people about how to leave, but so far they’ve all said that escape is impossible.
OKALIS: I am sorry to report that my investigations have not bore fruit either. I’ve scoured the <color=orange>Large Dimension</color>, but have been thoroughly unable to find any new passageways.

AZOLLA: This is troubling news. If we are unable to locate an exit, then I do not like our odds of reuniting with the rest of our clan, or locating the <color=orange>Eye of the Universe</color>. Continue searching for an exit, I refuse to believe that we are entirely ensnared by the <color=purple>Bramble</color>.
NESIA: That is… troubling. Suppose they simply haven’t found a suitable exit yet?
SENNETTI: I find that to be very unlikely. The Dree have been here for thousands of years, the idea that they would overlook an exit for that long is improbable.
